home.subtitle: Recruitment of university and technical college students from abroad for holiday work
home.text1: Many German farmers need seasonal workers from abroad. It is even better if seasonal workers have basic language skills in German or English. The seasonal work is 90 days, mainly in June, July, August. The company JAS-Vermittlung offers Uzbek students seasonal job opportunities in Germany.

requirement.title: Requirement for the employer
requirement.text4: Three months to keep the students busy
requirement.text6: Pay placement fee (monthly 99 euros per worker)

advantages.title: Benefits for the employer
advantages.text3: Learn knowledge about German culture through German language
advantages.text5: No employment subject to social security contributions due to student status
advantages.text6: Students are employed in all areas

about.subtitle: Recruitment of university and technical college students from abroad for holiday work

todo.title: What we do?
todo.text1: Student placement from abroad in summer (holiday job, 90 days)
todo.text2: Skilled worker placement from abroad (graduates, long-term)

services.subtitle: Recruitment of university and technical college students from abroad for holiday work

list.title: Our Services
list.text2: Carry out selection procedures in German and specialist knowledge abroad
list.text3: Application for a work permit (ZAV) at the Federal Employment Agency
list.text4: Assisting students with the visa process
list.text5: We take over private health insurance for up to 3 months
list.text6: Airport pickup and contact with employer
list.text7: Employer and student integration support during employment
